languages.text: "Сомнение — первый шаг к ересям! Избавьте слабосильные умы от размышлений и устремите все чаяния души на службу!"
"Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"
languages.original_text: "Сомнение — первый шаг к ересям! Избавьте слабосильные умы от размышлений и устремите все чаяния души на службу!"

traits.locale_text: "Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"
"Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"
"Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"

languages.text: 「疑念は異端への第一歩である！弱い心を思考から解き放ち、魂のすべての願望を奉仕に向けなさい！」
languages.original_text: "Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"

traits.locale_text: 「疑念は異端への第一歩である！弱い心を思考から解き放ち、魂のすべての願望を奉仕に向けなさい！」

languages.text: « Le doute est le premier pas vers l'hérésie ! Détournez vos faibles esprits de toute pensée et redirigez toutes les aspirations de votre âme vers l'office. »
languages.original_text: "Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"

traits.locale_text: « Le doute est le premier pas vers l'hérésie ! Détournez vos faibles esprits de toute pensée et redirigez toutes les aspirations de votre âme vers l'office. »

languages.text: “怀疑是堕入异端的第一步。将你们脆弱的心灵从思考中解放出来，把灵魂一切渴望都用来服侍帝皇吧！”
languages.original_text: "Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"

traits.locale_text: “怀疑是堕入异端的第一步。将你们脆弱的心灵从思考中解放出来，把灵魂一切渴望都用来服侍帝皇吧！”

languages.text: «¡La duda es el primer paso hacia la herejía! ¡Liberad vuestras débiles mentes de todo pensamiento y canalizad las aspiraciones de vuestras almas a servir con diligencia!».
languages.original_text: "Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"

traits.locale_text: «¡La duda es el primer paso hacia la herejía! ¡Liberad vuestras débiles mentes de todo pensamiento y canalizad las aspiraciones de vuestras almas a servir con diligencia!».

languages.text: "Zweifel sind der erste Schritt zur Ketzerei! Erlöst Euren schwachen Verstand vom Denken und richtet alle Ambitionen der Seele auf den Dienst aus!"
languages.original_text: "Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"

traits.locale_text: "Zweifel sind der erste Schritt zur Ketzerei! Erlöst Euren schwachen Verstand vom Denken und richtet alle Ambitionen der Seele auf den Dienst aus!"

languages.text: "Şüphe, kâfirliğe giden ilk adımdır! Zayıf zihinlerinizi düşünceden arındırıp nefsinizi hizmete adayın!"
languages.original_text: "Doubt is the first step toward heresy! Deliver your weak minds from thought and direct all aspirations of the soul to the service!"

traits.locale_text: "Şüphe, sapkınlığa giden ilk adımdır! Zavallı akıllarınızı düşüncelerinden arındırın ve nefsinizi hizmete adayın!"
